actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Resolution to authorize the President to issue a proclamation designating the first week in April each year, as National Rural Health Week.

summary.text: Requests the President of the United States to proclaim the week beginning April 4, 1977, as "National Rural Health Week."

titles.title: Resolution to authorize the President to issue a proclamation designating the first week in April each year, as National Rural Health Week.
